message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. This gives you a good chunk while ensuring I get a larger share.
Alice, your initial offer was a bit unbalanced. Let's be fairer to both of us this time.
Bob, it's important to settle this quickly. I'm willing to meet you closer to the middle, but the deal won't get any better for you with time.
Alice, the clock is ticking and the value is decreasing. I'm offering a more than fair deal to end this now.
Bob, this is a fair offer considering the time pressure. It's in your best interest to accept now before inflation eats further into your share.
